Title: Glanders
Writer: Joseph Weisberg (created by), Joel Fields, Joseph Weisberg
Actors: Keri Russell, Matthew Rhys, Dylan Baker, Lev Gorn
Plot: Elizabeth and Phillip are supposed to get a biological weapon sample but fail to make the exchange when someone is watching. Nina works Anton in hopes it will lead to her freedom. Paige wonders if she can trust Pastor Tim with her secret.
